instructions.name: accept_authority
docs: Completes the authority transfer. Only the address proposed in

accounts.name: new_authority
docs: The new authority accepting the transfer

instructions.name: add_reserve_funds
docs: Add funds to the reserve pool
Allows the authority to add additional funds to the reserve,
which can be used to seed jackpots after wins or rollovers.
* `amount` - Amount of USDC lamports to add

accounts.name: authority_usdc
docs: Authority's USDC token account (source of funds)

instructions.name: buy_bulk
docs: Buy multiple lottery tickets in a single transaction
Purchases up to 50 tickets with selected numbers from 1-46.
All numbers must be unique within each ticket and within valid range.
USDC is transferred from player to prize pool and house fee accounts.
Tickets are stored in a unified ticket account for efficient storage.
Enforces per-user ticket limits (max 5000 per draw).
* `params` - Array of ticket number sets (max 50 tickets)

accounts.name: lottery_state
docs: NOTE: Boxed to reduce stack frame size below SBF's 4096-byte limit.
LotteryState is large (~300+ bytes) and combined with 8 other accounts
in this struct, the unboxed version exceeds the stack offset limit.

accounts.name: unified_ticket
docs: The unified ticket account to be created for storing all tickets

instructions.name: buy_syndicate_tickets
docs: Buy tickets for a syndicate using pooled funds
Uses the syndicate's pooled USDC to purchase lottery tickets.
Only the syndicate creator can initiate purchases.
Transfers funds from syndicate account to prize pool and house fee.
Note: Individual ticket accounts must be created separately via
* `params` - Ticket numbers to purchase (max 10 per call)

accounts.name: creator
docs: The syndicate creator initiating the purchase (only creator can buy for syndicate)

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation
to prevent fund-lock after creator transfer.

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (source of funds)

instructions.name: buy_ticket
docs: Purchases a ticket with 6 selected numbers from 1-46.
Numbers must be unique and within valid range.
USDC is transferred from player to prize pool and house fee accounts.
Enforces per-user ticket limits (max 5000 per draw).

accounts.name: ticket
docs: The ticket account to be created

instructions.name: cancel_authority_transfer
docs: Cancels a proposed authority transfer before it's accepted.
Only the current authority can cancel.

instructions.name: cancel_config_proposal
docs: Clears the pending config hash and timelock, preventing execution.

instructions.name: cancel_draw
docs: Allows the authority to cancel a draw that has timed out
(more than 1 hour since randomness commit). This is a recovery
mechanism for when the oracle fails or network congestion prevents

instructions.name: check_solvency
docs: Allows ANYONE to verify that on-chain token balances match the
internal accounting state. If a mismatch is detected, the lottery

accounts.name: caller
docs: Anyone can call solvency check (permissionless for transparency)

accounts.name: prize_pool_usdc
docs: Prize pool USDC token account (holds jackpot + reserve funds)

instructions.name: claim_all_bulk_prizes
docs: Claim all prizes from a unified ticket (bulk purchase) in one transaction
Iterates through all tickets in the unified ticket and claims any
unclaimed prizes. May fail for very large unified tickets due to
compute limits - use claim_bulk_prize for individual claims instead.

accounts.name: player
docs: The player claiming the prizes (must be unified ticket owner)

accounts.name: unified_ticket
docs: The unified ticket containing the tickets

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The draw result for the ticket's draw

accounts.name: player_usdc
docs: Player's USDC token account (to receive prize)

instructions.name: claim_bulk_prize
docs: Claim prize for a specific ticket within a unified ticket (bulk purchase)
Calculates match count against winning numbers for a specific ticket
in the unified ticket account and transfers the appropriate prize.
* `params` - Parameters including ticket index within the unified ticket

accounts.name: player
docs: The player claiming the prize (must be unified ticket owner)

accounts.name: unified_ticket
docs: The unified ticket containing the tickets

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The draw result for the ticket's draw

accounts.name: player_usdc
docs: Player's USDC token account (to receive prize)

instructions.name: claim_prize
docs: Claim prize for a winning ticket
Calculates match count against winning numbers and
transfers the appropriate prize from the prize pool.
Verifies prize pool solvency before transfer.
- Match 2: Free ticket (credited to user stats)

accounts.name: player
docs: The player claiming the prize (must be ticket owner)

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The draw result for the ticket's draw

accounts.name: player_usdc
docs: Player's USDC token account (to receive prize)

instructions.name: claim_syndicate_member_prize
docs: Claim a member's share of syndicate prize
Transfers the claimed amount from syndicate to member's wallet.
Updates member's contribution and recalculates shares.

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation

accounts.name: member_usdc
docs: Member's USDC token account (receives the prize)

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (source of prize)
FIXED: PDA seeds must match CreateSyndicate: [SYNDICATE_SEED, b"usdc", syndicate.key()]
Previously used [SYNDICATE_SEED, b"usdc", creator, syndicate_id] which derives a
different address and causes account validation failures.

instructions.name: claim_syndicate_wars_prize
docs: Claim Syndicate Wars prize for syndicate
Transfers prize from competition pool to syndicate account.
Syndicate must have a valid rank (1-10) and prize must not be claimed.

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation
to prevent fund-lock after creator transfer.

accounts.name: wars_prize_pool_usdc
docs: Syndicate Wars prize pool USDC token account

instructions.name: close_syndicate
docs: Closes the syndicate and returns rent to creator.
Only the creator can close, and only when all other members have left.
Any remaining USDC is transferred to the creator.

accounts.name: creator_usdc
docs: Creator's USDC token account (to receive remaining funds)

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (will be closed)

instructions.name: commit_randomness
docs: Commit to randomness for the upcoming draw
This is the COMMIT phase of the commit-reveal pattern.
It stores the randomness account reference, commit slot, and timestamp.
The randomness must NOT be revealed yet at this point.
- Must be called BEFORE randomness is revealed
- Stores seed_slot and timestamp for verification during reveal
- If execute_draw is not called within 1 hour, the draw can be
cancelled via cancel_draw to prevent stuck states

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority initiating the commit (must be lottery authority)

instructions.name: create_syndicate
docs: Create a new syndicate (group buying pool)
Creates a syndicate that allows multiple players to pool
Also creates the syndicate's USDC token account.

accounts.name: creator
docs: The creator of the syndicate (becomes manager)

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: The syndicate account to be created

instructions.name: create_syndicate_ticket
docs: Create a single ticket account for a syndicate
Called after buy_syndicate_tickets to create individual ticket accounts.
The funds have already been transferred; this creates the account record.

accounts.name: payer
docs: The payer for the ticket account (typically syndicate creator)

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: The syndicate that owns the ticket

accounts.name: ticket
docs: The ticket account to be created

instructions.name: distribute_syndicate_prize
docs: Transfers prize from prize pool to syndicate account and calculates
manager fee. Individual members must claim their shares separately.

accounts.name: manager
docs: The syndicate creator/manager (must also be lottery authority)

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: Used to look up winning numbers and per-tier prize amounts.

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (receives the prize)

accounts.name: prize_pool_usdc
docs: Prize pool USDC token account (source of prize)

instructions.name: distribute_syndicate_wars_prizes
docs: Distribute Syndicate Wars prizes to top syndicates
Sets ranks for top 10 syndicates and prepares for prize claims.
Individual syndicates must claim prizes separately.
Only lottery authority can distribute prizes.

accounts.name: wars_prize_pool_usdc
docs: Syndicate Wars prize pool USDC token account

instructions.name: emergency_fund_transfer
docs: Emergency transfer funds from reserve or insurance pool to prize pool
Transfers funds from reserve or insurance pools to the prize pool
during insolvency emergencies. This should only be used when:
- Prize pool is insufficient to pay winners
- Reserve/insurance funds are needed to cover shortfalls
* `amount` - Amount to transfer in USDC lamports

accounts.name: insurance_pool_usdc
docs: Insurance pool USDC token account (source for Insurance transfers)

accounts.name: prize_pool_usdc
docs: Prize pool USDC token account (source for PrizePool transfers, destination for Insurance)

accounts.name: destination_usdc
docs: External destination USDC token account (for emergency withdrawals)

instructions.name: execute_config
docs: Execute proposed configuration changes (Phase 2 of timelock)
Applies the previously proposed configuration changes after the
24-hour timelock has expired. Params must exactly match the proposal.

instructions.name: execute_draw
docs: Execute the draw by revealing randomness
This is the REVEAL phase of the commit-reveal pattern.
It retrieves the revealed randomness from Switchboard,
verifies it matches the commit, and generates winning numbers.
- Randomness account must match the committed reference
- Creates draw result with winning numbers

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority executing the draw (SECURITY FIX: was previously permissionless)
Without this, anyone could call execute_draw once randomness was committed,
enabling MEV actors to observe randomness and frontrun the reveal.

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The draw result account to be created

accounts.name: randomness_account_data
docs: The Switchboard randomness account (must match committed account)

accounts.name: payer
docs: The payer for the draw result account creation

instructions.name: finalize_draw
docs: Finalize the draw with winner counts
Called after off-chain indexing determines winner counts.
updates jackpot balance, and prepares for next draw.
Handles empty winner tiers by redistributing funds to other tiers
or adding to reserve if no winners in any tier.

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The draw result account to be finalized

instructions.name: finalize_syndicate_wars
docs: Marks competition as inactive after it has ended.
Must be called before prize distribution.

instructions.name: force_finalize_draw
docs: Emergency instruction that forces a draw to complete without
distributing prizes. Only use when critical bugs are discovered
WARNING: Tickets will not receive prizes. Users may need

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: SECURITY FIX (Audit Issue #3): The DrawResult account for this draw.
If `execute_draw` was called before the emergency, a DrawResult already
exists on-chain. We mark it as explicitly finalized with zero prizes so
that `claim_prize` can find the account, see zero prize amounts, and
handle the force-finalized draw gracefully (no prize, no error).
Without this, tickets for force-finalized draws were permanently
unclaimable because no DrawResult existed or it remained un-finalized.

instructions.name: fund_seed
docs: Fund the initial seed for the lottery
This instruction transfers the seed amount from authority to prize pool,
sets the jackpot balance, and unpauses the lottery.
MUST be called after `initialize` before the lottery can operate.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority funding the seed (must be lottery authority)

accounts.name: authority_usdc
docs: Authority's USDC token account (source of seed funds)

instructions.name: initialize
docs: This sets up the main lottery state account with initial configuration.
Can only be called once. The caller becomes the authority.
IMPORTANT: The lottery starts PAUSED and UNFUNDED. You must call
`fund_seed` after initialization to deposit the seed USDC and activate.

accounts.name: authority
docs: The authority that will control the lottery (should be a multi-sig)

instructions.name: initialize_syndicate_wars
docs: Initialize Syndicate Wars competition for a month
Creates competition state and transfers 1% of prize pool to competition.

accounts.name: wars_prize_pool_usdc
docs: Syndicate Wars prize pool USDC token account

instructions.name: join_syndicate
docs: Adds the caller to a syndicate with a USDC contribution.
Member shares are calculated proportionally to contributions.

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: Note: realloc is handled conditionally in the handler to avoid
unnecessary space allocation when existing members add contributions

accounts.name: member_usdc
docs: Member's USDC token account (source of contribution)

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (destination for contribution)

instructions.name: leave_syndicate
docs: Removes the caller from a syndicate and refunds their contribution.
The creator cannot leave (must use close_syndicate instead).

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: Note: Creator CAN leave if they have transferred creator role or have 0 contribution
and there are other members with contributions

accounts.name: member_usdc
docs: Member's USDC token account (to receive refund)

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (source of refund)

instructions.name: pause
docs: Stops all lottery operations including ticket purchases and draws.

instructions.name: propose_authority
docs: Proposes a new authority. The new authority must call `accept_authority`
to complete the transfer. This prevents accidentally transferring

instructions.name: propose_config
docs: Starts a 24-hour timelock by storing a hash of the proposed changes.
The actual changes are NOT applied until execute_config is called

instructions.name: reclaim_expired_prizes
docs: Reclaim expired/unclaimed prize funds from a past draw
Sweeps unclaimed committed prizes back into reserve_balance after
the TICKET_CLAIM_EXPIRATION window has fully elapsed. This prevents
"zombie" committed funds from accumulating in total_prizes_committed
The authority must compute the correct reclaim amount off-chain by
inspecting unclaimed tickets for the given draw.
* `params` - Draw ID and amount to reclaim

accounts.name: draw_result
docs: The DrawResult for the expired draw.
Used to verify the draw exists, is finalized, and its claim window
Fix #3: Made mutable so we can increment `total_reclaimed` to enforce
per-draw reclaim bounds and prevent cross-draw theft / double-reclaiming.

instructions.name: register_for_syndicate_wars
docs: Register syndicate for Syndicate Wars competition
Syndicate must have at least 5 members to register.
Competition must be active and within registration period.

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation
to prevent fund-lock after creator transfer.

accounts.name: wars_entry
docs: Syndicate Wars entry for this syndicate

instructions.name: remove_syndicate_member
docs: Remove a member from syndicate (creator only)
Allows the syndicate creator to remove a member and refund their contribution.
Members can also leave voluntarily via `leave_syndicate`.

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation.
After a creator transfer, syndicate.creator differs from the original
creator used during PDA derivation. Using original_creator ensures

accounts.name: syndicate_usdc
docs: Syndicate's USDC token account (source of refund)
FIXED: PDA seeds must match CreateSyndicate: [SYNDICATE_SEED, b"usdc", syndicate.key()]
Previously used [SYNDICATE_SEED, b"usdc", manager.key(), syndicate_id] which derives
a different address and causes account validation failures.

instructions.name: transfer_authority
docs: Legacy single-step authority transfer. Now only sets pending_authority

instructions.name: transfer_syndicate_creator
docs: Transfer syndicate creator role to another member
Allows the current creator to transfer management responsibility
to another existing syndicate member. This enables the creator to
leave the syndicate after transferring the role.
* `params` - Transfer parameters including new creator's wallet

accounts.name: creator
docs: The current creator transferring the role

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation

instructions.name: unpause
docs: Resumes lottery operations after a pause.
The lottery must be funded to unpause.

instructions.name: update_config
docs: For production use, prefer propose_config  execute_config flow.
Will refuse to run if a timelock proposal is active.

instructions.name: update_syndicate_config
docs: Allows the syndicate creator to update:

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation
to prevent fund-lock after creator transfer.

instructions.name: update_syndicate_wars_stats
docs: Update syndicate statistics during Syndicate Wars
Updates tickets purchased, prizes won, and win count for a syndicate.
Only lottery authority can update stats.

accounts.name: syndicate
docs: SECURITY FIX (Issue #1): Use original_creator for PDA seed derivation

instructions.name: withdraw_creator_contribution
docs: Allows the creator to withdraw their contribution without
leaving the syndicate. Useful for reducing stake without
* `amount` - Amount to withdraw (must be <= creator's contribution)

accounts.name: creator_usdc
docs: Creator's USDC token account (to receive withdrawal)

instructions.name: withdraw_house_fees
docs: Transfers house fees to a treasury or operator account.
* `amount` - Amount to withdraw in USDC lamports

accounts.name: destination_usdc
docs: Destination USDC token account for withdrawn fees

errors.name: NotOwner
errors.msg: Caller is not the owner of this account.

errors.name: NotTicketOwner
errors.msg: Caller is not the ticket owner.

errors.name: InsufficientJackpotFunding
errors.msg: Jackpot is below minimum required amount.

errors.name: NumbersNotSorted
errors.msg: Ticket numbers must be sorted in ascending order.

errors.name: InsufficientFunds
errors.msg: Not enough funds to purchase ticket.

errors.name: TicketSaleNotStarted
errors.msg: Ticket sale has not started yet.

errors.name: TicketSaleEnded
errors.msg: Ticket sale has ended for this draw.

errors.name: RandomnessRevealTooSoon
errors.msg: Randomness reveal too soon after commit.

errors.name: PrizeDistributionDust
errors.msg: Prize distribution would create dust amounts.

errors.name: InsufficientMainLotterySpend
errors.msg: Insufficient main lottery spend for Quick Pick access.

errors.name: ClaimWindowNotExpired
errors.msg: Claim window has not expired yet. Prizes can still be claimed.

errors.name: ReclaimAmountExceedsCommitted
errors.msg: Reclaim amount exceeds committed prizes for this draw.

errors.name: PrizesAlreadyReclaimed
errors.msg: Prizes for this draw have already been reclaimed.

errors.name: AlreadyDistributed
errors.msg: Prizes have already been distributed for this competition.

errors.name: SyndicateTicketNotOwned
errors.msg: Ticket does not belong to this syndicate.

errors.name: SyndicateTicketDrawMismatch
errors.msg: Ticket draw ID does not match the distribution draw ID.

errors.name: SyndicateTicketAlreadyClaimed
errors.msg: Ticket has already been claimed/processed for syndicate distribution.

errors.name: DrawNotFinalized
errors.msg: Draw result must be finalized before distributing syndicate prizes.

errors.name: NoWinningTicketsInBatch
errors.msg: No winning tickets found in the provided remaining accounts batch.

errors.name: InvalidTicketAccount
errors.msg: Failed to deserialize ticket account from remaining_accounts.

types.name: BulkTicketsPurchased
docs: Emitted when multiple tickets are purchased in bulk

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID the tickets are for

fields.name: tickets
docs: Array of ticket number sets, each containing 6 numbers between 1 and 46

fields.name: tickets
docs: Array of ticket numbers (each ticket has 6 numbers)

fields.name: use_free_ticket
docs: Whether to use a free ticket credit (if available)

types.name: ClaimBulkPrizeParams
docs: Parameters for claiming a prize from a unified ticket

fields.name: ticket_index
docs: The index of the ticket within the unified ticket to claim (0-based)

types.name: ClaimSyndicateMemberPrizeParams
docs: Parameters for claiming a member's share of syndicate prize

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount to claim (must be <= member's share)

types.name: ClaimSyndicateWarsPrizeParams
docs: Parameters for claiming syndicate wars prize

types.name: DistributeSyndicatePrizeParams
docs: Parameters for distributing a prize to syndicate members

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID for which the prize is being distributed

types.name: DistributeSyndicateWarsPrizesParams
docs: Parameters for distributing Syndicate Wars prizes

fields.name: ranked_syndicates
docs: Array of syndicate public keys in rank order (1st to 10th)

types.name: DrawCancelled
docs: Emitted when a draw is cancelled due to timeout

fields.name: tickets_affected
docs: Number of tickets affected (remain valid for rescheduled draw)

types.name: DrawExecuted
docs: Emitted when a draw is executed (winning numbers revealed)

fields.name: was_rolldown
docs: Whether this was a rolldown draw

types.name: DrawFinalized
docs: Emitted when a draw is finalized with winner counts

types.name: DrawForceFinalized
docs: Emitted when a draw is force finalized (emergency)

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID that was force finalized

fields.name: tickets_affected
docs: Number of tickets affected (will NOT receive prizes)

types.name: DrawInitialized
docs: Emitted when a new draw is initialized

types.name: DrawResult
docs: Draw result account - stores results of a completed draw

fields.name: total_tickets
docs: Total tickets sold for this draw

fields.name: was_rolldown
docs: Whether this was a rolldown draw

fields.name: match_6_prize_per_winner
docs: Prize amounts per winner by tier (set during finalization)

fields.name: is_explicitly_finalized
docs: Explicit flag set when draw is finalized (handles edge cases)

fields.name: total_committed
docs: Total prizes committed for this draw at finalization time (in USDC lamports).
to enforce per-draw reclaim bounds and prevent cross-draw theft.

fields.name: total_reclaimed
docs: Total prizes reclaimed from this draw so far (in USDC lamports).
`total_reclaimed <= total_committed` is enforced on every reclaim.

types.name: DynamicFeeTierChanged
docs: Emitted when dynamic house fee tier changes

fields.name: jackpot_balance
docs: Current jackpot balance that triggered the change

types.name: EmergencyFundTransferred
docs: Emitted when emergency fund transfer occurs

types.name: EmergencyPause
docs: Emitted when the lottery is paused

types.name: EmergencyUnpause
docs: Emitted when the lottery is unpaused

types.name: ExpiredPrizesReclaimed
docs: SECURITY FIX (Audit Issue #5): Emitted when expired/unclaimed prize funds
are reclaimed from a past draw back into the reserve pool.
committed amounts for draws whose claim window has long expired, leading to
an ever-growing gap between committed and paid totals.

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID whose unclaimed prizes were reclaimed

fields.name: winner_counts
docs: Winner counts by tier (submitted by indexer)

fields.name: verification_hash
docs: Verification hash: SHA256(draw_id || winning_numbers || serialized_winner_counts || indexer_nonce)
This serves as a commitment to the off-chain winner data, enabling post-hoc auditing.
Off-chain indexers must publish the preimage so anyone can verify the hash on-chain.

fields.name: indexer_nonce
docs: Nonce used by the indexer when computing the verification hash (for replay protection)

types.name: FundSource
docs: Source of funds for emergency transfer

types.name: HardCapReached
docs: Emitted when hard cap is reached and rolldown is forced

types.name: HouseFeesWithdrawn
docs: Emitted when house fees are withdrawn

fields.name: house_fee_bps
docs: Initial house fee in basis points

fields.name: jackpot_cap
docs: Jackpot cap (soft cap for rolldown trigger)

fields.name: seed_amount
docs: Seed amount for new jackpot cycles

types.name: InitializeSyndicateWarsParams
docs: Parameters for initializing Syndicate Wars competition

types.name: InsurancePoolFunded
docs: Emitted when insurance pool is funded

types.name: InsurancePoolUsed
docs: Emitted when insurance pool is used for prize pool shortfall

fields.name: amount_used
docs: Amount transferred from insurance to prize pool

types.name: JackpotSeeded
docs: Emitted when the jackpot is seeded

types.name: JackpotWon
docs: Emitted when the jackpot is won

types.name: LotteryInitialized
docs: Emitted when the lottery is initialized

types.name: LotteryState
docs: Main lottery state account - stores all global lottery configuration and state

fields.name: pending_authority
docs: Pending authority for two-step transfer (None if no transfer pending)

fields.name: jackpot_balance
docs: Current jackpot balance in USDC lamports

fields.name: reserve_balance
docs: Reserve fund balance for future draws

fields.name: insurance_balance
docs: Insurance fund balance for guaranteed payouts

fields.name: fixed_prize_balance
docs: Dedicated fixed prize pool balance in USDC lamports.
Tracks the 39.4% allocation from ticket sales earmarked for fixed prizes
(Match 3/4/5). Previously this was implicit and prizes were paid from

fields.name: house_fee_bps
docs: Current house fee in basis points (10000 = 100%)

fields.name: seed_amount
docs: Initial seed amount for new jackpot cycles

fields.name: soft_cap
docs: Soft cap threshold for probabilistic rolldown

fields.name: hard_cap
docs: Hard cap threshold for forced rolldown

fields.name: next_draw_timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp of next scheduled draw

fields.name: commit_slot
docs: Slot when current randomness was committed

fields.name: commit_timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when randomness was committed (for timeout)

fields.name: total_prizes_paid
docs: Total prizes actually paid out via USDC transfers at claim time (lifetime).
Incremented when real USDC leaves the prize pool, NOT at finalization time.

fields.name: total_prizes_committed
docs: Total prizes committed at finalization time (lifetime).
Incremented during finalize_draw when prize amounts are calculated.
May differ from total_prizes_paid due to unclaimed/expired tickets.

fields.name: is_draw_in_progress
docs: Whether a draw is currently in progress

fields.name: is_rolldown_active
docs: Whether rolldown is active for the next draw

fields.name: is_funded
docs: Whether the lottery has been funded with initial seed

fields.name: config_timelock_end
docs: Unix timestamp when a pending config change becomes effective.
0 means no pending config change. Config updates are proposed first,
then can only be executed after this timestamp (minimum 24-hour delay).

fields.name: pending_config_hash
docs: SHA256 hash of the pending config change parameters.
Used to verify that the executed config matches what was proposed.
Zero hash means no pending config change.

fields.name: emergency_transfer_total
docs: Cumulative amount transferred via emergency_fund_transfer (PrizePool source)
within the current rolling window. Reset when a new window starts.

fields.name: emergency_transfer_window_start
docs: Unix timestamp marking the start of the current emergency transfer rolling window.
Window duration is 24 hours. When a new transfer exceeds the window,
the total resets. Prevents unlimited repeated small drains.

types.name: LuckyNumbersBonusClaimed
docs: Emitted when a Lucky Numbers NFT bonus is claimed

types.name: LuckyNumbersNFTMinted
docs: Emitted when a Lucky Numbers NFT is minted

types.name: NewStreakRecord
docs: Emitted when a user achieves a new streak record

types.name: PrizeClaimed
docs: Emitted when a prize is claimed

fields.name: free_ticket_issued
docs: Whether a free ticket was issued (Match 2)

types.name: QuickPickDrawExecuted
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick draw is executed

types.name: QuickPickPrizeClaimed
docs: Emitted when Quick Pick prize is claimed

types.name: QuickPickTicketPurchased
docs: Emitted when a Quick Pick ticket is purchased

types.name: RandomnessCommitted
docs: Emitted when randomness is committed for a draw

fields.name: draw_id
docs: The draw ID whose expired prizes should be reclaimed

fields.name: amount
docs: Amount to reclaim (must be <= committed - paid for this draw).
The authority computes this off-chain by checking unclaimed tickets

types.name: RemoveSyndicateMemberParams
docs: Parameters for removing a syndicate member

types.name: RolldownExecuted
docs: Emitted when a rolldown is executed

types.name: SoftCapReached
docs: Emitted when soft cap is reached and rolldown becomes possible

types.name: SolvencyCheckPerformed
docs: Emitted when prize pool solvency check is performed

types.name: Syndicate
docs: Syndicate account - represents a group buying pool

fields.name: creator
docs: Current syndicate creator/manager (mutable  can be transferred)

fields.name: original_creator
docs: Original creator at PDA creation time (immutable  used for PDA seed derivation).
This MUST NEVER be changed after initialization. All PDA seeds and CPI signer
seeds must use this field instead of `creator` to prevent fund-lock after
creator transfers. See Issue #1 in security audit.

types.name: SyndicateCreated
docs: Emitted when a new syndicate is created

fields.name: unclaimed_prize
docs: Unclaimed prize balance in USDC lamports.
Snapshot-based: set during distribute_syndicate_prize based on
share_percentage_bps at distribution time. Decremented on claim.
Prevents race condition where early claimers reduce the live token
balance and later claimers get less than their fair share.

types.name: SyndicateMemberJoined
docs: Emitted when a member joins a syndicate

fields.name: share_bps
docs: Share of the syndicate in basis points

types.name: SyndicatePrizeDistributed
docs: Emitted when a syndicate prize is distributed

types.name: SyndicateWarsConcluded
docs: Emitted when Syndicate Wars competition concludes with prize distribution

types.name: SyndicateWarsEntry
docs: Syndicate Wars entry for a syndicate

types.name: SyndicateWarsFinalized
docs: Emitted when Syndicate Wars results are finalized

types.name: SyndicateWarsStarted
docs: Emitted when a Syndicate Wars competition starts

fields.name: is_distributed
docs: SECURITY FIX (Audit Issue #2): Guard flag to prevent prizes from being
distributed more than once. Without this, the authority could call
and potentially causing double-spend or ranking manipulation.

types.name: TicketData
docs: Ticket account - represents a single lottery ticket

types.name: TicketPurchased
docs: Emitted when a ticket is purchased

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID the ticket is for

fields.name: new_creator
docs: New creator's wallet address (must be existing member)

types.name: UnifiedTicket
docs: Unified ticket account for bulk purchases

fields.name: owner
docs: Wallet that owns all tickets in this account

fields.name: draw_id
docs: Draw ID that all tickets are for

fields.name: start_ticket_id
docs: Starting ticket ID for this batch

fields.name: ticket_count
docs: Number of tickets in this account

fields.name: numbers
docs: Array of lottery numbers (one per ticket, flattened as [u8; 6] arrays)

fields.name: purchase_timestamp
docs: Unix timestamp when tickets were purchased

fields.name: claimed_bitmap
docs: Claimed status for each ticket (bitmap for efficiency)

fields.name: ticket_price
docs: New ticket price (None to keep current)

fields.name: house_fee_bps
docs: New house fee in basis points (None to keep current)

fields.name: jackpot_cap
docs: New jackpot cap (None to keep current)

fields.name: seed_amount
docs: New seed amount (None to keep current)

fields.name: soft_cap
docs: New soft cap (None to keep current)

fields.name: hard_cap
docs: New hard cap (None to keep current)

fields.name: switchboard_queue
docs: New Switchboard queue (None to keep current)

fields.name: draw_interval
docs: New draw interval (None to keep current)

fields.name: name
docs: New syndicate name (max 32 bytes UTF-8, empty to keep current)

fields.name: manager_fee_bps
docs: New manager fee in basis points (max 500 = 5%)

types.name: UpdateSyndicateWarsStatsParams
docs: Parameters for updating syndicate wars stats

types.name: UserStats
docs: User statistics account - tracks player participation and achievements

fields.name: last_draw_participated
docs: Last draw ID where user participated

fields.name: tickets_this_draw
docs: Number of tickets purchased in the current draw (for limit enforcement)

fields.name: free_tickets_available
docs: Number of free tickets available (from Match 2 wins)

types.name: UserStatsUpdated
docs: Emitted when user stats are updated

types.name: WinnerCounts
docs: Winner counts structure for draw results
